summary: A stylish and classy black mage outfit.
descriptionHtml:
``What you learn here will last you a lifetime. Several if you're talented.'' - Archmage Savos Aren.

A stylish and classy black mage outfit. This armor is craftable, and has recipes for cloth and multiple light armor tiers. Each set provides robes, gloves, a choice of boots, and a circlet. Crafting will require the appropriate perks and materials. The circlet acts as head armor. These sets count as matched armor for the corresponding standard armor sets.

Multiple tiers of armor means you can keep the same look from leather quality all the way to dragonscale quality.

Light Armor Sets

Magus Leather Armor
Magus Scaled Armor
Magus Obsidian Armor (glass)
Magus Dragon Armor (dragonscale)

Also available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=82220908

Changes for 1.2
- Fixed circlets
author: Brandybuck
